living-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
living-collection.description: Re-Lyte keeps me hydrated as I work in the field, and I love Real Salt and seasonings on the eggs, meat, and vegetables I raise!

living-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
living-collection.description: Re-Lyte products help me perform at my best! I also love Redmond's natural seasonings and care products, so I know what I'm putting on or in my body.

living-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
living-collection.description: I love Redmond Living products because I know they're made with nourishing, responsibly sourced ingredients that feel good on and in my body, helping me live my best life.

living-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
living-collection.description: Redmond's Real Salt and seasonings are unparalleled! I love these products, whether I'm preparing a quick meal for myself or an elaborate twelve-course meal for a dinner party.

living-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
living-collection.description: My kids love Relyte, and so do I! Redmond products help us stay hydrated and healthy, allowing us to feel our best and spend quality time together.

agriculture-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
agriculture-collection.description: Redmond Agriculture products nourish my animals and the soil on my land!

agriculture-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
agriculture-collection.description: I'm no farmer, but I'm sure Redmond Agriculture products are great!

agriculture-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
agriculture-collection.description: I love Redmond soil products in my small home vegetable garden!

agriculture-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
agriculture-collection.description: Redmond soil products have helped me grow incredible vegetables in my little kitchen garden!

agriculture-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
agriculture-collection.description: My kids and I love Redmond soil products in the garden. Together, we're learning to grow delicious organic vegetables!

equine-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
equine-collection.description: I use Daily Gold and Daily Red for my beloved quarter horse. They make him healthy as...well...a horse!

equine-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
equine-collection.description: Horses and humans alike can be peak performers! Redmond Equine products have played a significant role in winning equestrian competitions.

equine-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
equine-collection.description: I'm not a horse, but if I were, I'm sure I'd love Redmond Equine products!

equine-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
equine-collection.description: I'm not a horse person. I'm too busy cooking!

equine-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
equine-collection.description: I'd love to own horses someday, but right now I'm busy raising small kids and caring for our home!

hunt-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
hunt-collection.description: Redmond Hunt products help me have a successful hunt with my family every year!

hunt-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
hunt-collection.description: I'm not much of a hunter. I'd rather go for a trail run!

hunt-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
hunt-collection.description: No hunting for me, thanks! However, I appreciate that Redmond Hunt products support clean, natural practices that lead to better-quality meat in the stores I shop, while being respectful to the land and animals.

hunt-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
hunt-collection.description: I'll stick to the cooking and leave the hunting to others. As a chef, I care deeply about where my ingredients come from, though. These products help bring clean, responsibly sourced meat into my kitchen and onto the plate.

hunt-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
hunt-collection.description: Redmond Hunt products help me have successful hunts with my kids! I love spending time together in nature.

farm-to-table-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
farm-to-table-collection.description: I prefer to raise my own natural food when possible, but these products help me enjoy some natural foods that I can't always produce myself.

farm-to-table-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
farm-to-table-collection.description: The food I put into my body makes all the difference in my performance! These products keep me fueled and help me perform at my best!

farm-to-table-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
farm-to-table-collection.description: Natural, nutrient-dense foods are extremely important to me. I'm so glad I can find everything I need for my specific dietary needs at the Redmond stores, because those foods can be hard to track down! And I love the cafe for a good meal when I want to dine out.

farm-to-table-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
farm-to-table-collection.description: Redmond Farms products and the ingredients they carry in their stores are top quality! And I love their restaurant when I want a good meal, but I'm not able to cook it myself.

farm-to-table-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
farm-to-table-collection.description: I feel confident feeding these products to my kids and dining in the cafes. I'm so glad these stores make trustworthy, nutrient-dense foods accessible to the community. I know these foods will help my kids grow up healthy and happy!

valleywide-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
valleywide-collection.description: A farmer needs fences! These products keep my animals in and predators out.

valleywide-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
valleywide-collection.description: I don't pay much attention to fences, but if I need them, I'd call Valleywide first!

valleywide-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
valleywide-collection.description: Valleywide is the first company I'd call if I need a fence for my small home!

valleywide-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
valleywide-collection.description: Valleywide helped turn my patio into a beautiful place for outdoor dinner parties!

valleywide-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
valleywide-collection.description: I trust Valleywide's products to keep my kids and pets safe, and to make our yard a beautiful place to spend time together.

industrial-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
industrial-collection.description: I use this to clear my long driveway in the winter. It works beautifully and is safe to use around my animals!

industrial-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
industrial-collection.description: This salt helps keep the roads clear and my front porch safe so I can get out the door and to the gym safely!

industrial-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
industrial-collection.description: I love that this salt is both effective and safe for animals and the environment.

industrial-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
industrial-collection.description: This salt keeps the roads clear, allowing me to drive to the grocery store for last-minute ingredients in the winter. I love it!

industrial-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
industrial-collection.description: I buy a few bags every year, and I honestly love seeing Redmond salt on the roads. Knowing it's a safer option around our home gives me peace of mind, especially with kids and pets. It makes winter driving feel a little less stressful and a lot more family-friendly.

western-clay-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
western-clay-collection.description: The contractor who helped drill my water well loves these products!

western-clay-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
western-clay-collection.description: I don't personally use these products, but my brother, who's a contractor, might!

western-clay-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
western-clay-collection.description: These products aren't for me, but I'm sure they're great!

western-clay-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
western-clay-collection.description: I've never used these products, but my brother, who works in oil drilling, loves them!

western-clay-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
western-clay-collection.description: These products aren't for me, but I'm sure they're great!

pybus-point-lodge-collection.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
pybus-point-lodge-collection.description: I visited Pybus with my wife, and I loved connecting with nature and eating the fish I caught!

pybus-point-lodge-collection.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
pybus-point-lodge-collection.description: Pybus is wonderful! I loved hiking, fishing, and exploring all Alaska has to offer!

pybus-point-lodge-collection.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
pybus-point-lodge-collection.description: My trip to Pybus helped me connect with myself and the natural world.

pybus-point-lodge-collection.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
pybus-point-lodge-collection.description: Pybus was a wonderful trip. I loved catching my own fish, and I can't wait to cook the fish I brought home!

pybus-point-lodge-collection.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
pybus-point-lodge-collection.description: Pybus is a fantastic place to travel with my kids. It's family-friendly and a great place for kids to learn and explore!

items.title: Our Commitment
items.text: We honor our role in the food supply chain by maintaining high standards for the products on our shelves, the ingredients in our kitchens, and the practices on our farms.

items.title: Nutrient Rich
items.text: We focus on practices that protect nutritional density and maximize bioavailability, so you get the most out of every bite.

children.title: Sourcing Standards
children.text: We review sourcing inputs at every stage to maintain consistency and quality.

children.title: Long-Term Stewardship
children.text: We prioritize long-term practices that support people, animals, and the land.

items.title: Always Real
items.text: We vet every product and ingredient before bringing it into our stores or kitchens, because food should be made of food.

items.title: Intentionally Sourced
items.text: We prioritize sourcing from farmers and producers who honor heritage practices and uphold high ethical standards for people, animals, and the environment.
